name: danhunsaker/laravel-flysystem-others
description: Automatically registers every third-party Flysystem adapter it recognizes as a Laravel Filesystem Driver.

suggest.aliyuncs/aliyun-oss-flysystem: One of the options to use the 'oss' adapter (^1.2)
suggest.aobozhang/aliyun-oss-adapter: One of the options to use the 'oss' adapter (^1.0)
suggest.apollopy/flysystem-aliyun-oss: One of the options to use the 'oss' adapter (^1.2)
suggest.boofw/flysystem-qiniu: One of the options to use the 'qiniu' adapter (^1.0)
suggest.carlosocarvalho/flysystem-cloudinary: One of the options to use the 'cloudinary' adapter (^1.0)
suggest.cedricziel/flysystem-gcs: One of the options to use the 'google' adapter (^2.0)
suggest.enl/flysystem-cloudinary: One of the options to use the 'cloudinary' adapter (^1.1)
suggest.eqingdan/flysystem-qiniu: One of the options to use the 'qiniu' adapter (^0.1)
suggest.freyo/flysystem-qcloud-cos-v3: One of the options to use the 'qcloud' adapter (^)
suggest.freyo/flysystem-qcloud-cos-v4: One of the options to use the 'qcloud' adapter (^)
suggest.freyo/flysystem-qcloud-cos-v5: One of the options to use the 'qcloud' adapter (^)
suggest.ignited/flysystem-google-drive: One of the options to use the 'gdrive' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.ignited/flysystem-onedrive: One of the options to use the 'onedrive' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.integral/flysystem-pdo-adapter: One of the options to use the 'pdo' adapter (^1.0)
suggest.jacekbarecki/flysystem-onedrive: One of the options to use the 'onedrive' adapter (^1.0)
suggest.litipk/flysystem-fallback-adapter: Required to use the 'fallback' adapter, and with league/flysystem-replicate-adapter, the 'mirror' adapter (^0.1)
suggest.mgriego/flysystem-clamav: Scans files for viruses before storing them on an actual filesystem (^1.0)
suggest.monster/flysystem-aliyun-oss: One of the options to use the 'oss' adapter, but not recommended, since it uses the League namespace without being a Leage package (^1.0)
suggest.nao-pon/flysystem-google-drive: One of the options to use the 'gdrive' adapter (^1.1)
suggest.nicolasbeauvais/flysystem-onedrive: One of the options to use the 'onedrive' adapter (^1.0)
suggest.orzcc/aliyun-oss: One of the options to use the 'oss' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.overtrue/flysystem-qiniu: One of the options to use the 'qiniu' adapter (^1.0)
suggest.phlib/flysystem-pdo: One of the options to use the 'pdo' adapter (^1.1)
suggest.private-it/flysystem-google-drive: One of the options to use the 'gdrive' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.shion/aliyun-oss: One of the options to use the 'oss' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.spatie/flysystem-dropbox: Required to use the 'dropbox' adapter in PHP 7 (^1.0)
suggest.srmklive/flysystem-dropbox-v2: Required to use the 'dropbox' adapter in PHP 5 (^1.0)
suggest.superbalist/flysystem-google-storage: One of the options to use the 'google' adapter (^7.0)
suggest.t3chnik/flysystem-cloudinary-adapter: One of the options to use the 'cloudinary' adapter (dev-master)
suggest.twistor/flysystem-guzzle: One of the options to use the (read-only) 'http' adapter (^6.0)
suggest.twistor/flysystem-http: One of the options to use the (read-only) 'http' adapter (^0.2)
suggest.twistor/flysystem-stream-wrapper: Allows access to Flysystem drives using 'drive://path' streams (^1.0)
suggest.xxtime/flysystem-aliyun-oss: One of the options to use the 'oss' adapter (^1.2)
